channel.title: HELP REQUIRED! Please? how can I make it so when you log on you end up in varock
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left][/shadow] How do I make it so when I join my server I end up DIRECTLY in varrock, I realy want to know! please + thankyou! :)
P.S! DON'T JUST VIEW IT! TELL ME! I HATE VIEWERS! :mad:

item.title: HELP REQUIRED! Please? how can I make it so when you log on you end up in varock
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

well its in player.java as he said // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3227;//3227; teleportToY = 3219;//3219;

i found that in under this public Player(int _playerId) {

and you have to change x and y coords because thoose are to lumbridge as start point

Read full topic

item.title: HELP REQUIRED! Please? how can I make it so when you log on you end up in varock
item.dc:creator: @Quint Quint
item.description:
@Quint wrote:

go to player.java and search for the co-ordinates where u stand now if u log in for first time and change it to the co-ords of where u want to spawn first time.

if u dont understand ask what u dont understand, im not very good at english
